Seminar - Life of the Spouse Abroad
Claire Geddes is offering another Seminar on Monday 10th February at 8.30 - 10.45 at the library on the ISM Upper Campus. Click here to download the poster.
The topic is Life for the Spouse abroad:
Recreating your identity - who are you now? Not able to work - so what can I do in Moscow ?- Practical Life for the Expat Spouse The successful way to make plans and set goals Making memories and living the life you want
Places are limited and only a few seats left so if you want to attend, please email Claire as soon as possible on
familygeddes@hotmail.com
Have a great weekend.
Paul Seedhouse Headteacher The International School of Moscow World Class Education
